options: Proposal in House of People with simple majority
Proposal in Legislative Assembly with simple majority
Proposal in Legislative Assembly with full majority along with law passed by Parliament

question: What is the right method to establish or cancel the second chamber in the States?

The Parliament as per Resolution passed by the Legislative Assembly of the State
The Governor on the recommendation of the Council of Ministers
question: In any State of India, Legislative Council can be created or can be abolished by __________.
